verses.verse: Lo, mine eye <WH5869> hath seen <WH7200> <WH8804> all this, mine ear <WH241> hath heard <WH8085> <WH8804> and understood <WH995> <WH8799> it.
What ye know <WH1847>, the same do I know <WH3045> <WH8804> also: I am not inferior <WH5307> <WH8802> unto you.
Surely <WH199> I would speak <WH1696> <WH8762> to 'El SHaddai <WH7706>, and I desire <WH2654> <WH8799> to reason <WH3198> <WH8687> with 'Elohim <WH410>.
But <WH199> ye are forgers <WH2950> <WH8802> of lies <WH8267>, ye are all physicians <WH7495> <WH8802> of no value <WH457>.
O that <WH5414> <WH8799> ye would altogether <WH2790> <WH8687> hold your peace <WH2790> <WH8686> ! and it should be your wisdom <WH2451>.
Hear <WH8085> <WH8798> now my reasoning <WH8433>, and hearken <WH7181> <WH8685> to the pleadings <WH7379> of my lips <WH8193>.
Will ye speak <WH1696> <WH8762> wickedly <WH5766> for 'Elohim <WH410>? and talk <WH1696> <WH8762> deceitfully <WH7423> for him?
Will ye accept <WH5375> <WH8799> his person <WH6440>? will ye contend <WH7378> <WH8799> for 'Elohim <WH410> ?
Is it good <WH2895> <WH8804> that he should search you out <WH2713> <WH8799>? or as one man <WH582> mocketh <WH2048> <WH8763> another, do ye so mock <WH2048> <WH8762> him?
He will surely <WH3198> <WH8687> reprove <WH3198> <WH8686> you, if ye do secretly <WH5643> accept <WH5375> <WH8799> persons <WH6440>.
Shall not his excellency <WH7613> make you afraid <WH1204> <WH8762>? and his dread <WH6343> fall <WH5307> <WH8799> upon you?
Your remembrances <WH2146> are like <WH4912> unto ashes <WH665>, your bodies <WH1354> to bodies <WH1354> of clay <WH2563>.
Hold your peace <WH2790> <WH8685>, let me alone, that I may speak <WH1696> <WH8762>, and let come <WH5674> <WH8799> on me what will.
Wherefore do I take <WH5375> <WH8799> my flesh <WH1320> in my teeth <WH8127>, and put <WH7760> <WH8799> my life <WH5315> in mine hand <WH3709> ?
Though <WH2005> he slay <WH6991> <WH8799> me, yet will I trust <WH3176> <WH8762> in him: but I will maintain <WH3198> <WH8686> mine own ways <WH1870> before <WH6440> him.
He also shall be my salvation <WH3444>: for an hypocrite <WH2611> shall not come <WH935> <WH8799> before <WH6440> him.
Hear <WH8085> <WH8798> diligently <WH8085> <WH8800> my speech <WH4405>, and my declaration <WH262> with your ears <WH241>.
Behold now, I have ordered <WH6186> <WH8804> my cause <WH4941>; I know <WH3045> <WH8804> that I shall be justified <WH6663> <WH8799>.
Who is he that will plead <WH7378> <WH8799> with me? for now, if I hold my tongue <WH2790> <WH8686>, I shall give up the ghost <WH1478> <WH8799>.
Only do <WH6213> <WH8799> not two <WH8147> things unto me: then will I not hide <WH5641> <WH8735> myself from thee <WH6440>.
Withdraw <WH7368> thine hand <WH3709> far <WH7368> <WH8685> from me: and let not thy dread <WH367> make me afraid <WH1204> <WH8762>.
Then call <WH7121> <WH8798> thou, and I will answer <WH6030> <WH8799>: or let me speak <WH1696> <WH8762>, and answer <WH7725> <WH8685> thou me.
How many are mine iniquities <WH5771> and sins <WH2403>? make me to know <WH3045> <WH8685> my transgression <WH6588> and my sin <WH2403>.
Wherefore hidest <WH5641> <WH8686> thou thy face <WH6440>, and holdest <WH2803> <WH8799> me for thine enemy <WH341> <WH8802> ?
Wilt thou break <WH6206> <WH8799> a leaf <WH5929> driven to and fro <WH5086> <WH8737>? and wilt thou pursue <WH7291> <WH8799> the dry <WH3002> stubble <WH7179> ?
For thou writest <WH3789> <WH8799> bitter things <WH4846> against me, and makest me to possess <WH3423> <WH8686> the iniquities <WH5771> of my youth <WH5271>.

Thou puttest <WH7760> <WH8799> my feet <WH7272> also in the stocks <WH5465>, and lookest narrowly <WH8104> <WH8799> unto all my paths <WH734>; thou settest a print <WH2707> <WH8691> upon the heels <WH8328> of my feet <WH7272>.
And he, as a rotten thing <WH7538>, consumeth <WH1086> <WH8799>, as a garment <WH899> that is moth <WH6211> eaten <WH398> <WH8804>.
